subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN2613, missing items.
description_text:
Hi guys.

I placed an order last month .
But i am still waiting on 1 item .

I am still expecting my simmson pro shifter.

Order #SSN2613.

I have recieved the pedals and handbreak.
But still no shifter.


I was told buy your staff that the order would be possessed mid October.

Could you please give me and update and expected delivery date please.

Your help in this matter is greatly appreciated.

Kind regards

Robin.

On Thu, 25 Sept 2025, 17:50 SIMSONN, <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Robin, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi Robin Friel,    Our product upgrade is not yet complete, but we can process your refund immediately. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
